research_experience.title: PhD Fellow
research_experience.institution: National Genomics Data Center, Beijing Institute of Genomics, CAS & CNCB, Beijing, China
highlights: Developed 'ToxAssay' for biomarker discovery in toxicogenomics.
Created 'ALVA' for prioritizing compound targets using gene expression data.
Designed RSEL for predicting liver toxicity using ensemble learning.
Integrated DNA phenotyping with computer vision for facial recognition.

research_experience.title: Research Assistant
highlights: Developed a robust copula-based model for multi-phenotype GWAS analysis.
Analyzed microbiome data using over-dispersed and zero-inflated models.
Extended hierarchical naïve Bayes for three-level data classification.

research_experience.title: MSc Thesis Student
highlights: Proposed a hierarchical nested ANOVA model for biomarker discovery.
Identified glutathione metabolism pathway genes responsible for oxidative stress.

publications.title: ToxAssay: A hierarchical model-driven tool for advanced toxicogenomics biomarker discovery
publications.authors: Rana MM, Mollah MNH, et al.

publications.title: Prioritizing compound targets by perturbed gene expression using ALVA
publications.authors: Rana MM, Hasan MN, et al.
